text: Mordecai Fowler Ham, Jr. (April 2, 1877 â€“ November 1, 1961) was an American evangelist. He entered his ministry in 1901. In 1936, he started his Christian radio evangelism career. He continued working as an evangelist until shortly before his death in 1961. == Other websites == *Biography from Christian History Institute Category:1877 births Category:1961 deaths Category:American Baptist ministers Category:Evangelists Category:People from Kentucky
